text: Ava vachawana minda ye Eden (minda isingaperi), umo nzizi dzinoyerera nechemuzasi, imomo vachashongedzwa nefumba dzegoridhe (mabhenguru), uye vachapfeka hanzu nyoro yechiripo uye nesiriki gobvu. Vacharereka imomo pazvigaro zvepamusoro. Mubairo wakanaka sei uye nzvimbo yokugara yakanaka chaizvo
